WorkItem.ClosedComment: Already supported. There are optimizable stats for Avoided Attacks % and Avoided Interrupts %.
WorkItem.Description:
This would be useful as in the 10mans I run, I almost always am required to be on interrupt duty in some form or other.    This greatly increases the value of Hit on my gear and may also affect overall calculations if I am required to interrupt every 10-15 secs.
Â 
The fact that Hit is now important to me even though it isn't a big DPS increase means there is a much larger disparity between the Direct Upgrade pane and the results of a "Build Upgrade List" run which makes the gear lists much less useful and Rawr a lot slower to use (due to needing to run Build Upgrade Lists all the time).
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.Cat] An option to check if interrupts are required in a fight

Comments.Message: Not just for hit for interrupting but also aiming for expertise cap option would be nice. not being capped maybe better dps but getting the caps for both hit and exp will make rotation easier and you don't need to worry about missed rip/fb/rakes on complex fights where you need to worry about so many things allready
